text: Sergio Basso (born 11 June 1975 in Milan) is an Italian movie director, writer and scriptwriter. == Biography == === Early life === Sergio Basso’s passion for cinema dates back to his high school years. He spent several years in China. Beginning in 1996 he studied oriental art. Basso graduated from the University of Venice in 1999 with a degree in oriental languages. He also received a degree in Classics at the University of Milan in 2011. He graduated from Centro Sperimentale di Cinematografia in Rome in 2006. He is a member of the 'European Documentary Network Association'. He has attended seminars at the GITIS Moscow Theatre School. Basso began working in theater as a director for the Teatraz company. He then moved on to the movie industry. Basso spent two years as an assistant director on the set of Italian director Gianni Amelio’s The Missing Star. He directed a number of documentaries. Some of these were presented at the Festivals of Nyon, Annecy, Turin and San Francisco. === Career === In 2013, Basso directed the movie Amori elementari. It was released in movie theaters across Italy, Switzerland, Russia and Canada. The movie was premiered at the 36th Moscow International Film Festival. It also was shown at the 65th Giffoni Film Festival, the Rio International Film Festival, and at the 'Ostrajenie Film Festival in Moscow. It won the Grand Prix for Best Children Movie in Moscow. === Recent work === In 2014, Basso directed a documentary on China’s Han dynasty. It was commissioned by the Chinese state television network CCTV-6. === Internet and entertainment === Basso created one of the first Italian cross-media platforms, Giallo è finalmente a Milano , 21 aprile 2010. the documentary Giallo a Milano. It has new stories and characters that had first appeared in the documentary film of the same name. He has been collaborating with Italy’s national public broadcasting company RAI. He has made several cartoons for them. La IX Serie dei Cartoni dello Zecchino . Per l'animazione di uno dei personaggi di Giallo a Milano vince Il Festival Internazionale d'Animazione Annecy 2010, Giallo a Milano, Prix du film éducatif, scientifique ou d'entreprise. Giallo a Milano premiato per l'animazione, Corriere della Sera, 15 giugno 2010. nel 2010. Si occupa anche di cinematografia d'impresa, realizzando cortometraggi e reportage per Telecom, Corpo liquido . Save the Children, ONU, il museo MAXXI di Roma, MAXXI, Programma Auditorium, giugno 2011, 20 giugno 2011. De Agostini Editore. In 2010, Basso won the International Festival of Animation Annecy. This was for his animation work for one of the characters of Giallo a Milano. He has also made commercials. He has worked on campaigns for Telecom, Save the Children, the United Nations.
